question:
You are looking for a part-time job at a golf club.
Write a letter to the manager of the golf club.
In your letter, introduce yourself
explain what experience and special skills you have
tell him/her when you could start
text: I am writing this letter as I am looking for part-time job as a freelancer at your famous golf club.
My name is John Mathews, born and brought up in the environment of Sydney, Australia. I was privileged enough to get an opportunity to study arts in sports management and hold a bachelor’s degree.

I have three years of hands-on practice in this field, besides that, I am an active listener as well as someone who is good at teamwork and decision making. In addition to this, I expertise in being good at time management.

I am extremely passionate to commence my duty as soon as possible once you confirm my job as well as I would like to inform you that I prefer to work from 4 pm to 8 pm at weekdays and full time on weekends.
I would be delightedly grateful to you if you would consider me for this position and give me an opportunity to work at your esteemed institution.

error_list.error_des: The noun phrase part-time job seems to be missing a determiner before it. Consider adding an article.
It seems that you are missing a verb. Consider adding it.
It seems that preposition use may be incorrect here.
